item.title: Salesforce Datorama
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Salesforce Statement https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000363736&type=1 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov “Datorama is reported to be affected by CVE-2021-44228. The service has a mitigation in place and is being updated to remediate the vulnerability identified in CVE-2021-44228.” CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 14:15:51 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Salesforce Evergage (Interaction Studio)
